entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where dementors are standing guard at night.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who put Lord Voldemort's supporters in the care of creatures.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person with dangerous supporters and dementors behind him.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as the one who will be hard-pressed to stop Voldemort from regaining power.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as creatures that will join Voldemort if he asks them.

entities.name: cornelius
entities.description: Cornelius is mentioned in the context of sleeping less soundly due to knowing that Voldemort's supporters are in the care of creatures.

relationships.description: Voldemort has dementors as his supporters.
Fudge will be hard-pressed to stop Voldemort from regaining power.
Dumbledore has control over Voldemort's supporters.
Fudge will be affected by Cornelius' actions.
